--- In junit@y..., "David Hooker" <dhooker@a...> wrote:
> Why does the junit.samples.SimpleTest appear in my list of tests to 
run,
> even though I've deleted the class files from my classpath?  When I
> click the "..." button, it does not show up, but it does in the drop
> down list.
>  
> Any ideas?

The dropdown list is stored as a property. The "..." list is 
generated dynamically.

Kent
subject: Re: SimpleTest allways appears
